forum.content:
Love letters. from
the sand
on a day. like today we passed
the time. away 。
How you. laughed
when l. cried,
each. time. l. saw
the tide take. our
Love. letters. from
the sand.
you. made a vow
that. you. would
always. be. true ,
But. somehow. that
vow. meant nothing. to. you ,
Now. my. poor. heart. just. aches ,
with. ev"ry. wave it
breaks over. 。
Love. letters. in. the
sand。
forum.title: 標題；沙灘上的情書
